about_me.des: Soy un Colombiano que le encanta aprender, viajar y hacer deporte. Hice mi pregrado y maestría en la Universidad Nacional de Colombia Sede Manizales. Durante mi maestría viví alrededor de un año en Montreal. Trabajé como docente en la Universidad Nacional de Colombia Sede Manizales y la Universidad Autonoma de Manizales. En este momento soy estudiante de doctorado en la Universidad de Duisburg-Essen en Alemania. En este sitio web quiero mostrar un poco de mi vida profesional y compartir algunas experiencias y conocimientos.

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.

career.ude_lecture_desc: During the summer semester I solve the exercises of the Econophysics course that is coordinated by the Research Group Guhr. In the winter semester I teach the Data Analysis Laboratory coordinated by the Faculty of Physics.
career.ude_lecture_job: Econophysics exercises and data analysis laboratory - Lecturer
career.ude_phd_desc: I work in a really new and interesting field of physics: econophysics. Econophyics is an interdisciplinary research field that uses concepts in physics to solve problems in economics. You can take a look of my work in my GitHub repository.
career.unal_lecture_desc: I taught physics, physics laboratory and calculus in the Faculty of Exact and Natural Sciences for engineering.
career.uam_lecture_desc: I taught physics, physics laboratory and calculus in the Department of Physics and Mathematics for engineering.
career.unal_pgd_desc: Postgraduate Diploma. One year learning about management and projects. A small break from physics to learn something from a different field.
career.unal_master_desc: During my Master I worked on scanning electron microscopy and image processing. I made an internship in the Image Processing Laboratory at the University of Montreal. Here you can check my thesis.
career.unal_bachelor_desc: My first serious step in the academy. My Bachelor was an amazing time to learn the basics and discover a new world.
